function.name: FancyGetopt
function.abstract: Parses command line options and parameter list. args is the argument list to be parsed, without the leading reference to the running program. Typically, this means "sys.argv[1:]". option_table is an instance of Ft.Lib.CommandLine.Options.Options. Raises an exception if args contains syntax errors. Returns a tuple of (options, args) where options is a dictionary and args is the list of args after the first arg that wasn't in option_table. Note the options return value is different than what getopt.getopt() returns.
function.description: cmd is an Ft.Lib.CommandLine.Command instance, and is only used in reporting errors.
